excerpt: Rewrite of a small piece of code: the original Processing source is about 950 bytes. Pixels are drawn at the center. Then the canvas is enlarged a bit. Scaling by floating points in canvas is antialiased, so that causes the candy blur.
title: Experiment: starzoom
content: Rewrite of a small piece of code: the original Processing source is about 950 bytes. Pixels are drawn at the center. Then the canvas is enlarged a bit. Scaling by floating points in canvas is antialiased, so that causes the candy blur.
